title: AvMed
shortDescription: Florida-based nonprofit health insurer offering comprehensive autism and behavioral health coverage.
description:
AvMed is a Florida-based nonprofit health insurance company headquartered in Miami, serving Floridians since 1969. Originally founded as Aviation Medicine to provide pilot physicals for the airline industry, AvMed has grown to serve over 382,000 members across the state with offices in every major metropolitan area.

AvMed offers Medicare Advantage, individual and family, and employer group coverage throughout Florida. Their plans include coverage for autism spectrum disorder services as required by Florida law, including Applied Behavior Analysis (ABA) therapy, speech therapy, occupational therapy, and mental health services.

In December 2022, AvMed was acquired by Sentara Healthcare, bringing additional resources and expertise to their Florida operations. AvMed is recognized for its team-based, patient-centered care model and commitment to helping members achieve better health outcomes.

Under Florida law (sections 627.6686 and 641.31098, Florida Statutes), large group health plans must cover ABA therapy for individuals under 18 with an autism diagnosis, with annual limits of $36,000 and lifetime limits of $200,000.
benefits: Coverage for ABA therapy as mandated by Florida law
Speech, occupational, and physical therapy benefits
Behavioral health and mental health services
Medicare Advantage, individual, and employer group plan options
50+ years of experience serving Florida families
requirements: Prior authorization typically required for ABA and intensive services
Services must be deemed medically necessary
Autism diagnosis required for ASD-specific coverage
Coverage limits may apply ($36,000 annual / $200,000 lifetime per Florida law)
Provider must be in-network for full benefits
